interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: CASABLANCA BEAUTY®-Clear Eyelash Glue, False Eyelash Glue, Latex Free Eyelash Glue Clear Waterproof Suitable for Sensitive Eyes 0.16 US Fl oz
Review Date: 2021/06/14
Store: Casablanca Beauty
Product Description: ["The best-selling LUXE eyelash adhesive! Not messy, gunky or bad odors. Why You'll Love Our Glue: Casablanca Beauty is dedicated to making quality products available to our customers. 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed How to Use: 1. Using the precision brush, add a fine layer of adhesive to the false eyelash strip. 2. Wait 30 seconds for the adhesive to become tacky before applying. (Don't skip this step!) 3. Apply false eyelash as close as possible to the natural lash, gently press onto lash line until the entire eyelash strip is secured into place and adhesive is dried. *For best results, use Casablanca Beauty Lashes and accessories. VOILÁ- GORGEOUS, FLUTTERY, 24-HR HOLD LASHES!"]
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Casablanca Beauty', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Waterproof', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.6 x 0.6 x 4.5 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Casablanca Beauty'}
Review Text: The adhesion with tis was not even workable 4 me😵
Review Title: Didn't like it🥴
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

- **Brand Affinity:** The user remains invested in innovative brands that deliver effective solutions, but the recent interaction suggests a cautious approach moving forward. Their feedback indicates an expectation for high standards and reliability, especially when exploring products aimed at enhancing makeup application.

- **Overall Behavior:** The latest interaction reflects a more balanced perspective, reminding the user that not all products will align with their needs and preferences.
